tr: Gelmiş geçmiş en büyük adamlardan biridir.

en: Get off his back.
Would you like to leave a message for him?
tr: Ona bir not bırakmak ister misin?

en: My love for him has already cooled.
We knelt down to pray.
He cannot afford the common comforts of life, not to mention luxuries.
tr: Lüksleri bir yana, yaşamın sıradan rahatlıklarını bile karşılayamıyor.

en: He denied himself nothing.
He lives in luxury.
He led a life of luxury.
He carried out the plan he had made in detail.
tr: Yaptığı planı tüm ayrıntılarıyla hayata geçirdi.

en: He got his dander up.
He is a methodical person.
There was no budging him.
He tends to be arrogant.
He sat there with his arms folded.
He was sitting with his arms across his chest.
He was thinking, with his arms folded.
He looked at his watch.
He glanced at his watch.
He was standing with his arms folded.
He watched the game with his arms folded.
He was sitting with his arms folded.
He sat on the sofa with his arms folded.
tr: Kollarını kavuşturmuş bir şekilde kanepede oturdu.

en: He stretched out his arm for a magazine.
He was shot 3 times in the arm.
He has improved in skill.
He has powerful arms.
He has pains in his side.
He has a pain in his side.
He denied that he had accepted the bribe.
He admitted he had taken bribes.
He refused to take the bribe.
He changed the topic of conversation.
He has no small talk.
He's not good at making conversation.
tr: Sohbet etme konusunda pek iyi değil.

en: He has a lot of topics for conversation.
He needs a few jokes to lighten up his talk.
tr: Sohbetini şenlendirmek için birkaç espriye ihtiyacı var.

en: He went mad when he heard the story.
He stopped talking.
He made up the story.
He seems to have missed the point.
He was about to speak.
He didn't stop talking.
He was a neutral participant at the discussion.
He kept talking.
He never speaks unless spoken to.
He is easy to talk to.
He did not speak unless spoken to.
He is a good speaker.
He lives in a house built in a semi foreign style.
tr: Yarı yabancı tarzda yapılmış bir evde yaşıyor.

en: He reads foreign books, not to mention Japanese ones.
tr: Japon kitaplarını saymıyorum bile, yabancı kitaplar okur.

en: He wins his arguments by logical reasoning.
He will cast me a bone to pick.
He got home at six.
He came home at six.
He went home at six.
He is to come here at six o'clock.
He boasts that he can speak six languages.
He has become weaker with age.
He works hard to support his aged mother.
tr: Yaşlı annesini geçindirmek için çok çalışıyor.

en: He's working his hardest to support his aging mother.
tr: Yaşlı annesini geçindirmek için canla başla çalışıyor.

en: He got money from the old woman by a trick.
